section.name: Getting Started
section.subsection: Sun Position Calculations is an LGPL licensed Java library for calculating sunrise and sunset times for any location in the world.

subsection.name: Maven Build
subsection.p: Sun Position Calculations uses Maven 2.0 to build, run unit tests, and create the project web-site. Download Maven 2.0, and run mvn compile to build the library.

subsection.name: Eclipse
subsection.p: Before importing the Sun Position Calculations project into Eclipse, make sure that you have a successful Maven build. Maven will download all the dependencies needed to build Sun Position Calculations. You will need to define one Eclipse Java Classpath Variable, M2_REPO to point to the Maven 2.0 repository.
